forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle calm envelops the city beneath a partly cloudy sky. The air, crisp and invigorating with the hint of salt from the nearby ocean, holds a soft whisper of a breeze, a reminder that the shoreline is not far. With temperatures dropping to around fifty-one, it’s a night to embrace layers—perhaps a light jacket or a warm sweater paired with your favorite denim, just enough to ward off the coolness as evening strolls beckon.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the sun will break free from its evening shroud, promising a mostly sunny day with warmth reaching into the mid-sixties. A subtle shift in temperatures will occur as the day unfurls, bringing a sense of crispness that complements the blue expanses overhead. Wind will lend a touch of vigor to the atmosphere, making it an ideal moment to wander the city’s neighborhoods or perhaps find solace in one of its many parks. Given the robust clarity of the day, outdoor pursuits like sipping coffee in a serene café or casually exploring downtown streets lined with charming boutiques could foster peaceful moments amidst the bustle of life. 

In this clement scene, the marine layer hovers just beyond, a reminder of the ever-present dance between the city and its coastal embrace. Consider joining the tide of locals enjoying a serene walk by the waterfront as the sun begins its ascent, or find a cozy nook with good light, perfect for losing track of time in a book.
